48428.affected_area: Sioux Lookout, Red Lake, and Balmertown
live_updates: We are awaiting restoration of power to our equipment serving the affected areas.  Local power companies will be working overnight and into the morning, and once power is restored, services in these areas should begin working. Thank you for your patience.
Technical crews are dispatched to arrive on site to investigate this matter.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
48428.summary: Some customers in Sioux Lookout, Red Lake, and Balmertown are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
48428.title: Apr 6 - Sioux Lookout, Red Lake, and Balmertown | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
